classes.name: DashboardClient
classes.description: The client for handling everything. See {@tutorial GettingStarted} for more information how to get started using this class.

params.name: config
params.description: The config to pass to the new client

props.name: hooksBaseDir
props.description: The directory to the node_modules folder where Klasa-Dashboard-Hooks exists

props.name: router
props.description: The directory to the node_modules folder where Klasa-Dashboard-Hooks exists

props.name: routes
props.description: The cache where routes are stored

props.name: middlewares
props.description: The cache where middlewares are stored

classes.name: Middleware
classes.description:
Base class for all Klasa Middleware. See {@tutorial CreatingMiddlewares} for more information how to use this class
to build custom events.

params.name: file
params.description: The path from the pieces folder to the middleware file

params.name: core
params.description: If the piece is in the core directory or not

props.name: _handler
props.description: Stored bound run method, so it can be properly disabled and reloaded later

methods.name: run
methods.description: The run method to be overwritten in actual event handlers

params.name: next
params.description: The callback to trigger the next middleware

classes.name: MiddlewareStore
classes.description: Stores all the middlewares that are part of Klasa-dashboard-hooks

props.name: coreDir
props.description: The directory of pieces in Klasa relative to where its installed.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the middlewares from the store and removes the listeners.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes an middleware from the store.

params.name: name
params.description: An event object or a string representing the event name.

returns.description: whether or not the delete was successful.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets up an middleware in our store.

params.name: piece
params.description: The middleware piece we are setting up

classes.name: Route
classes.description:
Base class for all Klasa Routes. See {@tutorial CreatingRoutes} for more information how to use this class
to build custom events.

params.name: file
params.description: The path from the pieces folder to the middleware file

params.name: core
params.description: If the piece is in the core directory or not

props.name: route
props.description: Stored bound run method, so it can be properly disabled and reloaded later

classes.name: RouteStore
classes.description: Stores all the routes that are part of Klasa-dashboard-hooks

props.name: coreDir
props.description: The directory of pieces in Klasa relative to where its installed.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the routes from the store and removes the listeners.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes an routes from the store.

params.name: name
params.description: An route object or a string representing the event name.

returns.description: whether or not the delete was successful.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets up an route in our store.

params.name: piece
params.description: The route piece we are setting up

props.name: apiPrefix
props.description: The route prefix for the api

props.name: port
props.description: The port the api runs on
